module.name: Directory
module.changelog: *13.0.19.2* FREEPBX-14811 Able to set negative values for Invalid Retries under Directory *13.0.19.1* FREEPBX-14767 The invalid retries setting under Directory module is not working *13.0.19* FREEPBX-12690 add view for destinations usage *13.0.18.1* FREEPBX-14262 option for Terminate call not visible for french language *13.0.18* FREEI-337 Fix an issue with missing volume parameter *13.0.17* FREEPBX-13364 Ability to set ringer volume *13.0.16* Cleanup missing links *13.0.15* Add sound languages: it,fr,en_GB *13.0.14* FREEPBX-12368 fix install *13.0.13* FREEPBX-9167 allow combined recordings, fix bugs, upgrade class to php5 *13.0.12* FREEPBX-11894 Fix readContact tts.stream_file should not have extension. by Douglas Hammond *13.0.11* prefer speak over spell by matphillips *13.0.10* Recording dropdowns not reflecting proper values *13.0.9* Support Alert Info drop down *13.0.8* FREEPBX-9951 Japanese language prompts *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10119 Fix recording prompts. *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10118 Spelling *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10121 Fix custom entries *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9821 Fix validations on adding custom entries, also spruce up visuals *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9609 Option to Limit IVR Direct Dialing to a Directory *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* Add Spanish prompts *13.0.1alpha2* Fix popover resolves FREEPBX-8993 for directory
